About Me

Nelson Jeanrenaud

I'm a software developer with a B.Sc. in Computer Science and Communication Systems from HEIG-VD in the Software Development orientation, graduated in 2023. Here, you'll find my projects that demonstrate my skills and dedication to explore my passions in software, machine learning and data analysis.

My Career

HEIG / Abraxas

I began working part-time as a backend Java developer at Abraxas, while also serving as a teacher assistant in the Object-Oriented Programming course at HEIG-VD.

Sep. 2023
Ra&D Collaborator

Bachelor's degree

I graduated from HEIG-VD in Computer Science and Communication Systems in the Software Development orientation.

Sep. 2023
Student

Professionnal School

I earned my CFC in Software Development, along with a Professional Maturity Certificate, from the Centre de Formation Professionnelle et Technique (CFPT) in Geneva.

Sep. 2020

My Skills

My Projects

F1 Pit Predictor

In my bachelor's thesis, I compiled a dataset encompassing all Formula One races between 2018 and 2023. This dataset was utilized to train a machine learning algorithm capable of providing real-time strategic recommendations.

...   ...

F1 Telemetry Charts

Compilation of notebooks and scripts dedicated to create analysis of formula one sessions and comparing the performance of drivers and team.

...   ...

Careot

Careot is a mobile diet tracking application based on Flutter and Firebase.

...   ...

Spaceship 3000

Spaceship shooter game featuring dynamic, on-the-fly graphics style switching, implemented using the visitor design pattern.

...   ...

MonoBattle

My final CFC project, a Battleship game made using C# Monogame, playable locally or in local network using TCP.
